page.title: 16RIDDLESDEN HALL (Continued)
page.content: and onto the Great bedroom.Next into the Yellow Porch Chamber,also with a rose window. Then into another bedroom THE GREY LADY ROOM.Then into Mrs Starky's room,and there is a four poster bed. Then downstairs,and into the Dining Room,with a picture of OLIVER CROMWELL On into the large drawing room,which has a fire place with a motto on it. Then into the kitchen it has a large Oak Kist.This was used for storing grain and is the only original piece of furniture in the whole hall.Then you go out into the gardens. The cost is &1.00 for Adults and 50p for Children. by MELANIE JONES,JULIE COATES AND MIRANDA WHITTINGHAM.
